product_name: Gear Aid Plastic Snap Hooks - Package of 2
long_description: Give yourself a hand with the Gear Aid Plastic Snap Hooks, and easily replace broken tent-fly hooks. These durable hooks slide easily onto 4.75mm cord, D-rings, tri-glide buckles and webbing loops. Includes 2 no-sew replacement hooks.
short_description: Give yourself a hand with the Gear Aid Plastic Snap Hooks, and easily replace broken tent-fly hooks. These durable hooks slide easily onto 4.75mm cord, D-rings, tri-glide buckles and webbing loops.
